```{r}
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| eval: false

branch <- "develop"

is_available <- "metasurvey" %in% rownames(
    available.packages(
        repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org/"
    )
)

if (is_available) {
    install.packages("metasurvey")
} else {
    remotes::install_github(
        "metasurveyr/metasurvey",
        ref = branch,
        force = TRUE
    )
    message("Se instal贸 la versi贸n de desarrollo de metasurvey")
}
```
